title: Military lockdown after clashes in Sri Lanka
text:
Military lockdown after clashes in Sri Lanka 10:13am GMT - 01:31 
Sri Lanka's president declared a seven-day nationwide state of emergency on Tuesday, after violent clashes between Sinhalese Buddhists and the Muslim minority. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Sri Lanka's president declared a seven-day nationwide state of emergency on Tuesday, after violent clashes between Sinhalese Buddhists and the Muslim minority.
